ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Same here... ultimately it s just a matter of time before I m able to find one myself (gotta love charm).  I d be willing to go as high as 25pp - just to
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> I refuse to buy ANY lambent stones on principle :)

Same here... ultimately it's just a matter of time before I'm able to find
one myself (gotta love charm). I'd be willing to go as high as 25pp - just
to save myself some time. Unfortunately, more often than not, the people
selling Lambent Stones (as noted previously, they generally tend to be
druids) are asking outrageous prices for an object they can't even use.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
